com.manning.gwtia.ch03.server

Class FilmDataSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.manning.gwtia.ch03.server.FilmDataSet

  • public class FilmDataSet
extends java.lang.Object
    The FilmDataSet class is responsible for managing a set of films and importing the data from a .tsv file.
